people: The Editors of The Youth's Companion
text: Editorial Rooms.The Youth's Companion.Boston, Mass.Jan 14th, 1891Dear Sir,We are very glad you have sent "Ship Ahoy!" to The Companion, for it breathes a spirit which it is a pleasure to help in spreading, with our hearty thanks first, in hope you will accept Messrs. Perry Mason & Co's cheque for fifteen dollars ($15.00) in payment for the manuscript. Copies of the paper containing the lines will be sent you whenthey appear.Believe us,Faithfully yours,The Editors. The Editors of The Youth's Companion to Walt Whitman, 14 January 1891
